Description: Many men, kings and commoners, wore a badge with a religious subject on their hat.  The subject here is the visit the Virgin Mary paid to her cousin Elizabeth, when both were pregnant with the sons who would become Jesus Christ and John the Baptist.
Dimensions: with loop: 2 x 1/8 x 1 15/16 in. (5.1 x 0.35 x 4.9 cm)
